text: Nam Da-won (; born May 27, 1997), better known by the mononym Dawon, is a South Korean singer and actress. She is best known for being a member of the South Korean-Chinese girl group WJSN. ==Career== On December 31, the final unit of WJSN was announced: Natural Unit (Mei Qi, Luda and Dawon). Dawon officially debuted with WJSN on February 25, 2016 with the release of their debut mini album Would You Like?, including the title tracks "Mo Mo Mo" and "Catch Me." ==Discography== ===Soundtrack appearances=== Title Year Peak chart position Sales Album KOR Peak Gaon Chart Digital Chart Ranking "Shalala Romance" 2016 — rowspan="4" Lucky Romance OST Part 4 "I Will Love You Piece By Piece" — Sweet Stranger and Me OST "Fire & Ice" — The Snow Queen 3: Fire and Ice OST "Go Ready Go" 2017 — Revolutionary Love OST Part 3 "—" denotes releases that did not chart or were not released in that region. ==References== Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:K-pop singers
title: Nam Da-won
